subject: Accepted: Assistant Interactives Editor interview: Casey Miller
body:
On Jan. 28, at 04:13 PM, John Swansburg wrote:
Microsoft Outlook Web Access: https://outlook.office365.com/owa/slategroup.onmicrosoft.com/?ae=Item&a=open&t=IPM.Schedule.Meeting.Resp.Pos&id=RgAAAADIt2Nk79LJS4EKKzhJnHlrBwCs8Sy5qRzqRZf5%2FUlK313fAAAAAAAOAACs8Sy5qRzqRZf5%2FUlK313fAAF%2BLVriAAAM

To receive meeting invitations as .iCalendar attachments instead of Outlook Web App links, go to https://outlook.office365.com/owa/slategroup.onmicrosoft.com/?path=/options/popandimap and select Send meeting invitations in iCalendar format.
